Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: room
A room.
A unique room. The floor is laid with $(this.trait:floorcolor) $(this.trait:floormaterial) $(this.trait:floortype).
http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/craftable.jpg
Oh, lookie there! You can see outside. What a wonder. What a delight. All praise the coder who set this up.
the ceiling

Thick $(this.trait:ceilingwood) joists, sagging and uneven, cross the {? | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:ceilingcolor) } ceiling about eight feet overhead. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered.

Thick wooden joists, sagging and uneven, cross the {? | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:ceilingcolor) } ceiling. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered.

the eastern wall

The eastern wall is split horizontally by waist-high wainscotting. The upper half of the wall is covered in {? | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:wallcoloreast) } {? | $(this.trait:override:wallpattern) | $(this.trait:override:wallpattern) | $(this.trait:wallpatterneast) } {? | $(this.trait:override:wallmaterial) | $(this.trait:override:wallmaterial). | $(this.trait:wallmaterialeast). } The lower half is built of {? | $(this.trait:override:wainmaterial) | $(this.trait:override:wainmaterial) | $(this.trait:wainmaterialeast) } {? | $(this.trait:override:waintype) | $(this.trait:override:waintype). | $(this.trait:waintypeeast). } {? | $(this.trait:sconcebrief:east) | Upon this wall is a $(this.trait:sconcematerial:east) $(this.trait:sconcebrief:east). | } An aesthetically pleasing window is set in this wall.

The eastern wall is split horizontally by waist-high wainscotting. The upper half of the wall is covered in {? | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:wallcoloreast) } {? | $(this.trait:override:wallpattern) | $(this.trait:override:wallpattern) | $(this.trait:wallpatterneast) } {? | $(this.trait:override:wallmaterial) | $(this.trait:override:wallmaterial). | $(this.trait:wallmaterialeast). } The lower half is built of {? | $(this.trait:override:wainmaterial) | $(this.trait:override:wainmaterial) | $(this.trait:wainmaterialeast) } {? | $(this.trait:override:waintype) | $(this.trait:override:waintype). | $(this.trait:waintypeeast). }

The northern wall is split horizontally by waist-high wainscotting. The southern wall is split horizontally by waist-high wainscotting. the walls

The walls are split horizontally by waist-high wainscotting. The upper half of the walls are covered in {? | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | $(this.trait:override:wallcolor) | } {? | $(this.trait:override:wallpattern) | $(this.trait:override:wallpattern) | } {? | $(this.trait:override:wallmaterial) | $(this.trait:override:wallmaterial). | paint. } The lower halves are built of {? | $(this.trait:override:wainmaterial) | $(this.trait:override:wainmaterial) | wood } {? | $(this.trait:override:waintype) | $(this.trait:override:waintype). | paneling. }
